root.message: The CLASS_SYSTEM field for indicator 10-4-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: Classification of economic activities (CAE), National Classification of Goods and Services (CNBS); COPNI; COFOG, Classification Individual Consumption by Purpose (COICOP)
Classificação das actividades económicas (CAE), Classificação Nacional de Bens e Serviços (CNBS); COPNI; COFOG, Classificação Consumo Individual por Objectivo (COICOP)
